thread.title: Jake Tapper Has a Response to SNL’s Fatal Attraction Sketch
thread.title_full: Jake Tapper Has a Response to SNL’s Fatal Attraction Sketch

title: Jake Tapper Has a Response to SNL’s Fatal Attraction Sketch
text:
Maybe you enjoyed the Saturday Night Live sketch about Kellyanne Conway that was inspired by classic psychological-horror extravaganza Fatal Attraction; maybe you didn’t. That’s your prerogative! Either way, CNN’s Jake Tapper — the Michael Douglas, a.k.a. the Dan Gallagher, in this situation — has weighed in on his enjoyment of the digital short, and by the looks of it, he wasn’t particularly attracted to the whole idea.

Um https://t.co/pFOrMFWgqC 
— Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 12, 2017 He does ultimately have a fatal sense of humor about the whole thing, though. When asked by a fellow tweeter what he thinks of SNL as a whole, he responded : “Funny!” And in another Twitter correspondence, he jokingly lamented that his receding hairline on the show “may have been going more for a comment on my enormous forehead — it’s an 8head really.” We’re sure Kellyanne has a few thoughts she’s waiting to share.
